translations.This app provides a backend and frontend: Denna app ger en backend och frontend f칬r aviserings-API:n tillg칛nglig i Nextcloud.

This app provides a backend and frontend for the notification API available in Nextcloud.
		The API is used by other apps to notify users in the web UI and sync clients about various things. Some examples are:

游닓 Federated file sharing: You received a new remote share

游늼 Comments: Another user mentioned you in a comment on a file

游뚹 Update notification: Available update for an app or nextcloud itself

游닊 Announcement center: An announcement was posted by an admin
